Sort.description: the fields to sort the response objects by.  Field names are simply the name of the field in the response object.  Multiple fields can be specified by comma-separating their names. Specifying a field sorts it in ascending order (A->Z).  To sort in reverse (descending) order, place a minus sign (-) immediately before the field name.  Ex, 'product_name,-provider_name' will sort first by product_name ascending, then by provider_name descending (where the product_name is the same)

parameters.description: End date for the AI summary (YYYY-MM-DD format, defaults to today if empty, must be up to today and cannot go before start_date)
parameters.name: end_date

example.ai_summary: Saperix, Inc.'s security posture improved from a rating of 730 to 750 between January 20th and January 21st, 2025. This increase is due to improvements in several risk vectors. Specifically, Patching Cadence improved from a poor grade (D) to a fair grade (C), and SSL Certificates improved from a poor grade (D) to a fair grade (C). Despite these improvements, the company still faces significant challenges, including 42 total findings across various risk vectors, such as Patching Cadence, SSL Certificates, and Web Application Security. Fifteen of these findings are severe, with 3 directly affecting critical assets. Additionally, 2 compromised systems were identified. While the overall rating improved, the presence of severe findings and compromised systems warrants continued attention to mitigate risks and further improve the company's security posture.

parameters.description: the status of the vulnerability that should be returned, can contain one or more of the statuses that will be and together
parameters.name: status

count.description: the total number of records available to page through

query.description: the parameters used to make the request for this data

limit.description: the maximum number of records to return

offset.description: the starting record for the result set

query.description: The query parameters provided to the original call.  Only included if return_query is set to true

summaries.description: The filter summaries for the returned data.  Only included if include_summaries is set to true

enums.description: map of field name to the number of results that match

ranges.description: map of field name to the range of values present for that field

company_guid_or_default.description: GUID of the company or the string 'default'

company_relationship_types.description: The type of relationship between this company and the customer

links.description: A set of links to traverse the result set

relationship_type.description: the type of this fourth-party relationship.  'bitsight' if the relationship came from Bitsight's data, 'self' if the relationship was entered by a user, and 'none' if there is not yet a relationship with this fourth party

vulnerability_confidence.description: The confidence in findings for this vulnerability, either HIGH or LOW.
